item.title: [GRA1][Collaborative solutions] - MX Plan Filerz maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 19, 21:00 - 23:00 UTC

Jan 9, 16:37 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our MX Plan offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 19/01/2026 21:00 UTC
End time : 19/01/2026 23:00 UTC
Service impact : Filerz Mail will be temporarily unavailable for 40 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be performing an update for the storage servers hosting your data.
This version brings improvements to certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [BHS][Web Hosting] - Migration Cluster051 to Cluster151
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 13, 09:30 - 11:30 UTC

Dec 24, 21:12 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 13/01/2026 09:30 UTC
End time : 13/01/2026 11:30 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance, cluster051 will be temporarily unavailable for 2 hours maximum.
Outgoing gateway IP will change during maintenance, please find the new one here : https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-web-hosting-clusters-ip-addresses?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0052388
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a migration of cluster015 to cluster115.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Cluster100 incident notification
item.description:
Jan 9, 13:35 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Web Hosting offer on the specific cluster.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 09/01/2026 10:30 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : 503 errors might be observed for websites hosted on Cluster100.
Customers Impact : Customers can see some errors on their logs for the traffic coming from external crawlers : google bot, aibot, SEO bots, … that will receive 503 errors.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a software issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jan 9, 13:08 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Web Hosting offer on Cluster100.

Start time : 09/01/2026 10:30 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
